properties.name: openai.api.url
properties.description: URL for OpenAI's chat completions API

properties.name: openai.model
properties.description: OpenAI model to use for chat completions

properties.name: openaitest.app.jwtSecret
properties.description: Secret key used for JWT token generation and validation

properties.name: openaitest.app.jwtExpirationMs
properties.description: JWT token expiration time in milliseconds

properties.name: stripe.webhook.secret
properties.description: Stripe webhook secret for verifying webhook events
